name: Pawn Shop
description: A dusty old shop filled with forgotten treasures. The Pawn Shop is a dimly lit establishment, its shelves crammed with a bewildering assortment of items. A friendly old man with a magnifying glass peers at a pocket watch, his eyes twinkling with curiosity. The air is thick with the scent of old wood, brass, and the faint, sweet smell of pipe tobacco. This is a place where you can find anything from a rusty trumpet to a diamond ring, each with its own story to tell.
